ignore .idea directory
dependency versions updated

blue text color for blueprints
view encapsulation set

getting access to the template DOM with ViewChild

getting access to ng-content with ContentChild
navigation added by event binding and ngIf
passing recipe data with property binding
show the recipe details when clicking on the item
ingredients can be added to shopping list
directives exercise created

ngClass and ngStyle recap
basic attribute directive created
using renderer2 to build a better attribute directive
used HostListener to listen host events
used HostBinding to bind host properties
